Html:
Hi Guys,

Thanks for sharing your code. I'm fairly new to Kigg, and was wondering what is new in the 2.0 release?

Thanks,
Mitch

Hi Mitch,

Checkout the Whats new section in my blog post:
http://weblogs.asp.net/rashid/archive/2009/01/20/introducing-dotnetshoutout-com.aspx?CommentPosted=true#commentmessage

Thanks for your response. I did not know about DotNetShoutout, but now I do, and it looks great. Thanks for sharing.

Mitch
